summary: A playboy named Charlie, convinced that all his relationships are dead, meets the beautiful and mysterious Eva. Agreeing to a casual affair, Charlie then wants a bit more from their relationship.
cast: Terrence Jenkins|Cassie Ventura|Donald Faison|Dascha Polanco|Robert Christopher Riley|Lauren London|Paula Patton|Layla Jama|Casper Smart|Joe Pantoliano|French Montana|Steven Daniel Brun|Timothy DeLaGhetto|Brandy Norwood|Kali Hawk|Bria L. Harris|Raynald Larochell|Allie the Monkey|Joe Cappelletti|Kate Higgins|Mela Lee|Michael Okakpu|Tymica Spiller|Stacey Bender|Lubella Gauna|Jamaal Lewis|Sarah Spears
title: The Perfect Match
